title: (x) Bruce Springsteen "Born to Run" album cover - (similar to) Lightline Gothic {Stephen}
content:
Hello, does anybody know what the font is used on the Bruce Springsteen album Born to Run?

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/B0009J8GWG/sr=8-4/qid=1187844952...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130122024751/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/B0009J8GWG/sr=8-4/qid=1187844952/ref=dp_image_0/102-0955024-6092103?ie=UTF8&n=5174&s=music&qid=1187844952&sr=8-4 "http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/images/B0009J8GWG/sr=8-4/qid=1187844952/ref=dp\_image\_0/102-0955024-6092103?ie=UTF8&n=5174&s=music&qid=1187844952&sr=8-4")
author: bankbot

comments.content: Perhaps a lighter form of [Lightline Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130122024751/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/scangraphic/lightline_gothic_sh_regular/?sample_text=BRUCE%20SPRINGSTEEN&sample_size=36) available only pre-digitally. I suggest [Titling Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130122024751/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/titling_gothic_narrow_thin/?sample_text=BRUCE%20SPRINGSTEEN&sample_size=43) as an alternative.
